

## Functions

## Results
```{r}
### Set Up ###
AIZ = AIZResults(Binary = TRUE)
SimulationResultsList = readRDS(file = paste0(dir,"data/SimulationCases/Logistic/SimulationResults.rds"))
SimulationResultsReformatted = SimulationReformatResultsFunction(SimulationResultsList)
SimSEMedianList = SimulationResultsReformatted$SimSEMedianList
RunTimeList = SimulationResultsReformatted$RunTimeList
CoverageList = data.frame(SimulationResultsReformatted$CoverageList)
ParameterVector = SimulationResultsReformatted$ParameterVector
```

# Comparison

## Discrepancy 
```{r}
### Fucked up ###
ParameterVector = ParameterVector %>% mutate(Misspec. = c(rep("No",16),rep("Yes", 16)))
SimSEMedianList = SimSEMedianList[1:16,]
CoverageList = CoverageList[1:16,]
ParameterVector = ParameterVector[1:16,]

AIZ = AIZ[1:16,]
```

```{r}
### Discrepancy Epsilon ###
depsilon = .1

### Discrepancy ###
Discrepancy = list()
Discrepancy$SEPop = as.matrix(abs(AIZ$MedianSEPop - SimSEMedianList$Population))
Discrepancy$SECond = as.matrix(abs(AIZ$MedianSECond - SimSEMedianList$Conditional))
Discrepancy$CoverageCondPop = as.matrix(abs(AIZ$ThetaCondVarPop - CoverageList[,3]))
Discrepancy$CoverageCondCond = as.matrix(abs(AIZ$ThetaCondVarCond - CoverageList[,4]))
Discrepancy$Difference = as.matrix(abs(AIZ$Difference - SimSEMedianList$Difference))

### Indices ###
LargeDiscrepancyIndices = list()
LargeDiscrepancyIndices$SEPop = which(Discrepancy$SEPop >=depsilon)
LargeDiscrepancyIndices$SECond = which(Discrepancy$SECond  >=depsilon)
LargeDiscrepancyIndices$CoverageCondPop = which(Discrepancy$CoverageCondPop >=depsilon)
LargeDiscrepancyIndices$CoverageCondCond = which(Discrepancy$CoverageCondCond >=depsilon)
LargeDiscrepancyIndices$Difference = which(Discrepancy$Difference >=depsilon)

LargeDiscrepancyIndices
```


## Average Discrepancies

```{r}
mean(Discrepancy$SEPop)
mean(Discrepancy$SECond)
mean(Discrepancy$CoverageCondPop)
mean(Discrepancy$CoverageCondCond)
```

### Population
```{r}

# Misspecification #
Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$Misspec. == "No")]
# Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$Misspec. == "Yes")]

Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$Homo. == "No")]
Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$Homo. == "Yes")]

# Misspecification #
Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$SS == 50)]
Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$SS == 200)]

# Leverage #
Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$Leverage == "No")]
Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$Leverage == "Yes")]

# Covariates #
Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$K == 1)]
Discrepancy$SECond[ which(ParameterVector$K == 5)]
```
